pages.text: And a sign for them is that We carried their descendants in the loaded ship
and We created the like of it for them that they ride
And if We want We drown them, then they have no one to cry out to, and they would not be saved
except by a mercy from Us, and as an enjoyment for a while
And when it is said to them: be cautious of what is in front of you and what is behind you so you may receive mercy (they donâ€™t pay attention)
And no sign of their Master's sign came to them, unless they were turning away from it

And when it is said to them: spend (in God's way) from what God provided you. Those who disbelieved say to those who believed: should we feed someone that if God wants He would feed him? You are only in an obvious error
And they say: when is this promise if you are truthful
They only await a single awesome roar which takes them while they dispute
They cannot make any recommendation (or instruction) and they do not return to their families
And the trumpet is blown, then immediately they rush to their Master from the graves
They say: woe to us, who raised us from our resting place (graves)? This is what the beneficent promised and the messengers told the truth
It is only a single awesome roar, then immediately all of them are brought before Us
So today, no one is wronged at all, and you are only rewarded for what you used to do
